pages.text: $(philo)you may find it annoying, carrying around large amounts of fuel items on your person. klein stars are a solution to these woes, able to store large amounts of emc within them, and discharge it whenever desired. to fill it up, simply place it in an energy collector or relay. from there, simply carrying one will have it supply anything that consumes emc to function.
$(philo)klein stars are incredibly simple, being little more than a strip of alchemized iron fused with mobius fuel.
